result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Joshua R Whitfield not in court. Attorney Daniel Firkus appears in court. Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JB-clerk 11:09am  ADA Tolan gives status-ask for warrant. CT-based upon non-appearance warrant issued. adj 11:10am
Sentencing hearing on August 29, 2016 at 11:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua R Whitfield
Current: 900 N 4th St, Minneapolis, MN 55401 United States  (Effective: 06-02-2016)
Prior: 1st 6th St, Buffalo, MN 55313

Defendant Joshua R Whitfield in court with attorney Dan Firkus.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 131pm Atty Firkus req bond mod. 133pm recess. 151pm back on record. Stipulation to photograph and release evidence by parties. NC plea. CT accepts plea, finds G, enters JOC. CT mod bond to $2500 SIBS. CT mod on face of bond. 159pm adj.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for August 29, 2016 at 11:00 am. 

214pm back on the record. CT- Parties have signed Stip re: photograph and release of evidence. Def agrees. CT signs. 215pm adj.
Jury trial on June 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joshua R Whitfield in court with attorney Dan Firkus-by phone means.  Defendant Joshua R Whitfield in custody.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JB-clerk 1:40pm   CT goes over cc/penalties. Qualifies. Def-NG. CT-accepts plea. Atty Firkus-ask for change in bond-ask for SIBS. State-object. CT-maintain cash bond, if can provide verification that there is another TF that will accept him CT will modify bond, ST. adj 1:49pm  Jury trial scheduled for June 7, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Joshua Whitfield in court with Attorney Daniel Firkus. Defendant Joshua Whitfield incustody. Attorney Daniel Tolan appears in court for the State of Wisconsin. JB-clerk 1:09pm  CT-sets bond, might see TH or FR of week. adj 1:14pm
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint

Not to commit any new crimes.  Defendant shall give written notice to the Clerk of this Court within 48 hours of any changes of address or telephone number.  Must appear at all future court appearances.  Not to have contact with: Corey Traynor or 1841 70th Street, Balsam Lake, WI  54810
